metadata.title: CVE-2017-3302 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Crash in libmysqlclient.so in Oracle MySQL before 5.6.21 and 5.7.x before5.7.5 and MariaDB through 5.5.54, 10.0.x through 10.0.29, 10.1.x through10.1.21, and 10.2.x through 10.2.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3302` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-client - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-server - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libmariadbclient18 - 10.1.24-5
